description: ghoulish blue woman at center wearing a grey and white kimono with blue obi, holding a clump of bleeding hair, with blood dripping down onto screen or mirror in LLQ, while a horrified kneeling man wearing a blue kimono with white bamboo pattern looks on at left center; animal-shaped cartouche with figures in a landscape in ULC; two cartouches with inscriptions in URC--cartouche at right has grey and white mouse on top of it, two combs and a small blue bundle beneath; cartouches with inscriptions in LLC
title: Oiwake:  The Ghost of Oiwa Appearing to Takuetsu, No. 21 from "The Sixty-nine Stations of the Kisokaido Road"
